domains.title: Domains
domains.description: List of domains to crawl. The domains must be naked, i.e. specified without a protocol and sub-domains (e.g. example.com).

domainsFileUrl.title: Domains file URL
domainsFileUrl.description:
URL of the text file that contains the list of domains to crawl. The domains must be naked, i.e. specified without a protocol and sub-domains (e.g. example.com).

This field is useful if you have a large number of domains.

domainsFileOffset.title: Domains offset
domainsFileOffset.description: Indicates how many domains from the beginning of the list of domains should be skipped. This is useful if you only want to crawl a portion of the domains.

domainsFileCount.title: Domains count
domainsFileCount.description: Indicates how many domains should be crawled, starting from the offset. This is useful if you only want to crawl a portion of the domains. Leave empty to crawl all domains.

useChrome.title: Use Chrome
useChrome.description: If checked, the actor uses Chrome instead of Puppeteer's Chromium for the crawling. This might help to prevent blocking of some pages.

useApifyProxy.title: Use Apify Proxy
useApifyProxy.description: If checked, the actor uses Apify Proxy to access the target pages. This might help to prevent blocking of some pages.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max page retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Indicates how many times shall the crawl retry to load a page on error.

crawlLinkCount.title: Crawl sublinks
crawlLinkCount.description: Indicates how many links from the main page going to the same domain shall also be crawled.

crawlHttpsVersion.title: Crawl HTTPS version
crawlHttpsVersion.description: If checked, the actor attempts to crawl HTTPs version of the website (e.g. https://example.com for domain example.com).

crawlWwwSubdomain.title: Crawl www sub-domains
crawlWwwSubdomain.description: If checked, the actor attempts to crawl www sub-domain of the website (e.g. http://www.example.com for domain example.com).

saveScreenshot.title: Save screenshots
saveScreenshot.description: If checked, the actor stores screenshots of all loaded pages into the key-value store.

saveHtmlContent.title: Save HTML content
saveHtmlContent.description: If checked, the actor stores HTML content of all loaded pages into the key-value store.

saveText.title: Save text content
saveText.description: If checked, the actor stores text content of all loaded pages into the dataset results.
